# Changelog
All Notable changes to `oauth2-microsoft` will be documented in this file

## 2.2.0 - 2017-06-07

### Added
- Nothing

### Deprecated
- Nothing

### Fixed
- Nothing

### Removed
- Support for retrieving image urls.

### Security
- Nothing

## 2.1.0 - 2017-06-04

### Added
- Support for custom authorization urls, previous URLs serve as default values.

### Deprecated
- Nothing

### Fixed
- Nothing

### Removed
- Nothing

### Security
- Nothing

## 2.0.0 - 2017-01-25

### Added
- PHP 7.1 Support

### Deprecated
- Nothing

### Fixed
- Nothing

### Removed
- PHP 5.5 Support

### Security
- Nothing

## 1.0.0 - 2017-01-25

Bump for base package parity
